title.narrative: IR3 - HEALTH POLICIES AND STRATEGIES

description.narrative: IR 3: Health policies, strategies and systems supportive of Maternal, Neonatal, and Child Health (MNCH) scale-up and mitigation of emergencies., which contributes to Child Health, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Early Childhood Development, Health And Emergencies, Health Systems Strengthening, Maternal And Newborn Health, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF will contribute to increasing number of women and children have equitable Access to and Use of Quality Essential Social and Protection Services and practices with fon vulnerable groups and the most marginalised regions of Kenya by 2013
